description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) for Application Reference Number: 21/03340/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission ref: 21/00408/HOU (Erection of a part single, part two storey rear extension and two storey front extension. with associated changes to fenestration. Installation of 4no rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Erection of new front and side boundary walls and gate) dated 14/09/2021. Variation to include include changes to materials, fenestration, conversion of garage into habitable space and works to landscaping/boundary treatment) dated 05.05.2022. Variation to consist of changes to window glazing and bin store material.
